description: We invest in Apple computers because we are told they can do great things. As former Apple employees we helped thousands of people from all over the world to get the most out of their technology. The hardest part about learning a Mac is not knowing the questions to ask... So we've combined the best practices and tips we've learned that will make the most impact on your experience. In this course you will find over 30 lessons broken into short video clips as well as a downloadable PDF file of the best shortcuts you need to know. Take this course if you are looking for ways to simplify your experience and get the most our of your Apple investment!
title: Mac Essentials
